item.title: I hope China frees my father, Jimmy Lai, before it’s too late
item.description: Does Beijing want to create a martyr for freedom? His health is alarmingly deteriorating in prison.

item.title: A recipe for chaos: Young men want to get married more than women
item.description: The “war on boys” could be resulting in some women shunning marriage.

item.title: The European Union’s hypocrisies on Ukraine
item.description: France, Germany and Belgium see the speck in Trump’s eye but don’t notice the log in their own.
